context_bundle.summary: GitHub Actions: Native CI/CD for GitHub. YAML workflows in .github/workflows/. Key features: matrix builds, reusable workflows, marketplace actions, self-hosted runners, OIDC for cloud auth, secrets management, caching, artifacts, environments with protection rules.

onboarding.quick_start: GitHub Actions: 1) Create .github/workflows/ci.yml, 2) Define on: [push, pull_request], 3) Add jobs with runs-on: ubuntu-latest, 4) Use actions/checkout@v4, actions/setup-node@v4, 5) Cache dependencies with actions/cache@v4.
common_patterns: Matrix: strategy: matrix: { node: [18, 20], os: [ubuntu-latest, windows-latest] }
Caching: uses: actions/cache@v4 with: { path: node_modules, key: ${{ hashFiles('package-lock.json') }} }
OIDC: permissions: { id-token: write } for cloud provider auth

known_errors.cause: Workflow lacks required permissions (contents, issues, pull-requests)
known_errors.solution: Add permissions block: permissions: { contents: read, pull-requests: write }
known_errors.prevention: Explicitly declare minimal permissions per job
